task.title: Issue connecting to VM console from vCloud Director

context.p: This procedure provides instructions on how to resolve the issue of connecting to a VM console from vCloud Director (VCD). To resolve this issue, you have to accept the certificate for the VCD website.
To accept the certificate for the Console Proxy:

step.cmd: Log in to VCD using Chrome or Firefox.
Open a console to any VM.
If using Linix, open a JavaScript console using F12 for Firefox.

info.p: If using Windows, open a JavaScript console using Shift+Ctrl+J.

step.cmd: In the console, look for the line similar to the following:
Copy the preceding line to the address bar of your browser and replace wss with https.
When prompted, accept the certificate for this website.
